sub_title: Head of Social Media at G-Star
summary:
I’m a creative social, digital and content marketing leader with over 13 years of experience on start-up, agency and brand side. 

Key expertise: 
* Instagram and TikTok global strategies (organic and paid)
* Strategic social media & digital content direction
* Editorial calendar planning & multichannel content strategy
* Setup community management team and tools
* Real Time Marketing 
* Social first content briefings 
* New technology/media project management
* Social Media Trainings
* Developing of metaverse / NFT / Digital Fashion strategies
* Building of web3 minded communities

Professional experience in fashion, entertainment and in the sports industry as well as in management of celebrities, athletes and influencers.

Currently Head of Social Media at G-Star RAW

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for overseeing the global channels of G-Star and the social team. 
- Create social media first content to support global campaigns
- Create platform first strategies and content roll out
- Support global brand team in integrating TV and OOH campaigns to social
- Work with celebrities and influencers to create social content on set.
- Responsible for social media strategy direction for key markets

Responsible for driving digital innovations
- AI integrations with fashion and marketing
- NFT collections and development of utility and perks (G-NO)
- Metaverse integrations
- Digital fashion development
- Build a community of web3 minded people
profile_positions.title: Head of Social Media

profile_positions.description:
- Expand the range of creative responses the agency provides to clients and in pitches to include ideas incorporating new marketing channels and emerging technology.
- Empower agency positioning as a forward-thinking and pioneering challenger brand, locally and globally, around 3 verticals: new or niche social media, gaming and augmented reality.
- Nurture and grow (new) social media platform relationships: TikTok, Snap, Twitch, Facebook, etc.
- Educate and evangelise to always create social first and innovative content based on consumer insights and data learnings.
profile_positions.title: Brand Strategy and Innovation Lead

profile_positions.description:
GoSpooky is a full-service award winning social agency, powering stories with best-in-class video production, augmented reality, social advertising and everything in between.

Leading the social media team.

Clients: JBL, KLM, Coca Cola, Rituals, Toto, Albert Heijn, Tikkie, DEGIRO, Pathe, ABN Amro, Amazon Prime Video
profile_positions.title: Social Lead

profile_positions.description:
As part of the global social media team, I am in charge of the social content strategy and writing of social media specific briefs to support global campaigns, brand ambassadors, influencers and fashion shows.

Main responsibilities
•Currently responsible for creating and activating the global social strategy for Tommy Jeans, Tommy Sport, Tommy Kids and Accessories (Watches, eyewear and fragrances).
•Creation of brand ambassador social program support and maximize contractual postings.
•Currently cross functional lead for Tommy Jeans: Creating the strategy to bring together all consumer journey touch points to life at global scale (social + paid + digital + crm + stores). Point of contact with markets to streamline strategy and roll out of campaigns globally.
•Oversee round-the-clock global content calendar, publication, monitoring and event support.
•Oversee social analytics and reporting, including social listening. Close collaboration with social customer service team to engage and answer the audience’s product related questions.
•Responsible for the writing of social and paid content briefs for internal creative agency as well as directly managing freelancers and external agencies such as Corrino Studios, Starr Media, MediaMonks.
•Specialist on content creation briefs for Instagram Stories, Facebook Stories and Snapchat organic and paid.
•Develop content plans and strategies to leverage influencer partnership.
•Liaison with Product Marketing, PR, Celebrities & Influencers team and legal for seamless campaign integration.
•Monitor competitive social landscape, market & industry changes and developments.
•Experience working with social media tools such as Sprinklr, Crimson Hexagon, Listen First and Olapic.
•Understanding of social business tools such as Facebook Business Manager, Twitter Studio, Twitter Snappy TV, Instagram for business, Pinterest for business and Youtube Creator.
•Manage a team of 2, extends to 5 during fashion show weeks.
profile_positions.title: Global Senior Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Athletes / influencers are brands. Building brands through the creation of unique and entertaining content is the way to reach bigger audiences and acquire commercial partners.
My role is to support the brand, creative and commercial teams on their next steps based on data analytics, knowledge of the market, the platform dynamics and what the audience wants to consume. A mix of trends, analytics and platforms to build brands.

• Assist Head of Brand to develop strategies for each athlete / influencer.
• Assist Account Managers to write brand plans for each influencer.
• Advise the creative team on the best content/publication methods and social network features and technologies, that result in the highest engagement and fan conversion. 
• Advise influencers on what the best strategy is to fast-track growth of social media audiences.
• Translate social analytics data into constructive feedback for the creative team to produce better and more impactful content.
• Report back to clients on strategy development in relation to forecasts. Adjust strategy and objectives if necessary.
• Understanding of the social and online landscape and platforms.
• Continuous research on what’s coming, what’s old and what’s hot right now.
• Understanding of social analytics, KPIs and report at-hoc or periodically.
• Advise clients on which social network to join to reach new relevant audiences.
• Primary contact person with social media partners such as Facebook & Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, Sina Weibo, Google & Youtube.
profile_positions.title: Senior Digital Marketing Strategist

profile_positions.description:
During this period, my role switched to developing structures and procedures that enabled the company to better service clients and partners. This included hiring and training of team members as well as the project management of new tools. Tasks included:

• Co-ordination of the client onboarding.
• Successfully recruited, hired and trained editorial teams and community managers.
• Setup and negotiated photography contracts with major editorial companies.
• Project manager for the build up of the 90/24 app. The (iPhone) app serves as a content hub for all football players. I was involved from ideation of the application to launch, including introducing the app to the players. It’s currently being used daily by all 90/24 clients.
• At the beginning of 2016, 90/24 went through a major re-branding. I was directly responsible for executing and implementing the new look. I was project lead for the build up of 9024internatonal.com, 9024sports.com and 90/24 social media channels that serve as a portfolio of the content created for clients.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
As the first employee joining this innovative startup, I was responsible for all things social and technology. I had the privilege of working together with top football players active in the most important leagues of Europe as well as with top cyclists and music artists. I oversaw, managed and analysed the growth of fan bases counting in millions. Tasks included:

• Assisted top football players and artists in the publication of content on their profiles.
• Assisted clients with the creation of content, photography suggestions, copy and best time for publication. 
• Worked closely together with clubs, sponsors and client’s stakeholders to make sure brand guidelines, tags, hashtags were correctly communicated with the relevant audiences.
• Trained other community managers to co-ordinate social media content for new clients
• Developed extensive knowledge on the technical functionality of Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:

• Managing the entire social media product line life cycle including strategic planning, art direction, fulfillment and tactical activities
• Developing and implementing go-to-market strategies for new product packages
• Storytelling and art direction of social media campaigns
• Work closely with the sales department to create up-sell proposal to existing and/or new clients
• Seeking synergy by analyzing potential third party apps partnerships
• Research and analyze overall market landscape, understand future key trends that will affect product development initiatives
• Create and test product prototypes
• Manage product and feature delivery schedules, working in conjunction with the Digital Marketing Manager and other cross functional project teams.
• Specifying market requirements for current and future products
• Collaborate with design and technical development team in creating key product improvements and experiences. 
• Develop & conduct specialized training on new products launched and raise awareness & application of relevant subject matter. 
• Product evangelist internally and externally
profile_positions.title: Social Marketing Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Spotzer Media Group provides small businesses with full service digital marketing solutions featuring websites, videos, mobile sites and social media, headquartered in Amsterdam with operations in Europe, Australia and the US. I joined the creative studio of Spotzer to become the social media product leader and integrate it with the current digital solutions across all markets.

Key responsibilities:

•	Develop workflows for the creation of the social media products and synchronize efforts with the different teams per country.
•	Work closely with the website, video and mobile teams on the development of SEO and social friendly content packages for different categories and markets.
•	Support the commercial department on the creation of internal and external performance reporting.
•	Create custom social media strategies for premium clients, including concept ideas, 3 to 6 months planning, suggest budget, implementation workflow and expected results. 
•	Concept creator for organic and paid Facebook fan acquisition campaigns applying tactics such as sweepstakes, contests, vouchers, offline visual aid and Facebook ad campaigns.
•	Briefing, coordination and approval of the creative assets made by the graphic designers and copywriters.
•	Assist CEO and sales reps on the creation of sales propositions to win new contracts.
•	Creation of campaign case studies to prove the efficiency of our digital solutions.
•	Distribute corporate press releases as well as run own email marketing campaign efforts.
•	Create and manage employee newsletter campaigns and company announcements.
•	Assist HR manager in the search for talent, especially on LinkedIn.

Experience working with: Excel, Power Point, SalesForce, Google Docs, Corporate Gmail, Tweetdeck, Hootsuite, Shortstack (Facebook apps), Offerpop, Woobox, Mailchimp, WordPress.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Associate

profile_positions.description: Creation of a website based on Wordpress fully customized (HTML and CSS) to be used as main information center for the new student’s intake year 2010/11.  This project successfully triggered online social interaction amongst students before starting classes resulting in faster adaptation to school life.
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Leading the business student network of the HES Amsterdam. Focusing in building relationships between students and organizing events in order to integrate Dutch and international students.
Started from no members up to over 1500 members in less than 1,5 years, got featured in school magazines and school intranet as well as successfully negotiate and win a sponsorship of €45.000 per year to fund activities for students.
profile_positions.title: President

profile_positions.description:
Supporting to deliver standardized reports in a timely basis, during the close and forecast process. 
Assisting to analyze results and clarify variances during close and forecast window and on an at hoc basis.
Contribute in the area of deck preparations (first week of the month) and coordinate distribution of decks for the review meetings.
Assisting in the consolidation of monthly and quarterly results for Central and South East Europe countries.
Successfully improved automatization of reports by creating custom made Excel templates which retrieved only the most relevant information needed for analysis.
profile_positions.title: Business Planning Analyst Intern

profile_positions.description:
Main tasks: Webmaster, writing posts and organization of activities and events. Web analytics and SEO.
Managed to sell advertising space and get sponsorship from the school.
profile_positions.title: Founder and administrator

profile_positions.description:
Main tasks: Assist the webmaster in the optimization of the main website and landing pages in English, Dutch and German. 
Efforts improved search results rankings and traffic volume went up from 50 to 200 visitors per day.
profile_positions.title: Webmaster assistant
